refnamediv.refpurpose: This function fits an AR (p)-model with Yule-Walker estimates.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: a = aryule (x, p) [a, v] = aryule (x, p) [a, v, k] = aryule (x, p)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: <<<<<<< HEAD This function fits an AR (p)-model with Yule-Walker estimates. The first argument is the data vector which is to be estimated. ======= This is an Octave function.

This function fits an AR (p)-model with Yule-Walker estimates. The first argument is the data vector which is to be estimated. Output variable a gives the AR coefficients, v gives the variance of the white noise and k gives the reflection coefficients to be used in the lattice filter. >>>>>>> 6bbb00d0f0128381ee95194cf7d008fb6504de7d
